official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to the rate of interest on deductions from pay under the Civil Service Retirement System after performing sufficient service to earn the maximum annuity allowable.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to revise the formula for the rate of interest on deductions from pay under the Civil Service Retirement System after a Federal employee or Member of Congress performs sufficient service to earn the maximum annuity allowable.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to the rate of interest on deductions from pay under the Civil Service Retirement System after performing sufficient service to earn the maximum annuity allowable.
